title: Drawing, "Design for Hilt of a Dres", ca. 1780–90
medium:
Pen and black ink, wash, gold paint, traces of graphite
Support: off-white laid paper
markings:
Marks: C. BLAUW
Stamps: Verso: Cooper Union Museum for the Arts of Decoration
provenance: Giovanni Piancastelli, Rome; Mr. and Mrs. Edward Brandegee, Boston
creditline: Museum purchase through gift of various donors and from Eleanor G. Hewitt Fund

Drawing, "Design for Hilt of a Dres", ca. 1780–90.
